resources.string: This quiz consists of 4 questions and answers and the number of points achieved can give you a feedback about how far you are from your desired lifestyle. PCOS is not an enemy, it just teaches you to return back to our healthy life in this running world. Chin up!
Question 1: How many times is it recommended to eat a day if you have PCOS?
Question 2: What kind of breakfast is good to prevent high glucose level in your blood?
Question 3: What are the three core elements that you need to implement in your life in order to stay healthy?
Working hard, no relaxing, lots of coffee
Question 4: How many gram of carbohydrate do you need to consume a day?
